project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would consist of: (a) the construction of 66 minor irrigation sub-projects which will provide irrigation facilities for tracts of land ranging from 50 to 700 ha. in size; (b) upland reclamation of roughly 4,500 ha involving some 35 sub-projects; (c) the development of about 11,000 blocks of fuelwood plantations over an area of approximately 127,000 ha.; (d) the construction of a total of 850 kms of village roads and 200 bridges; (e) the construction of simple water supply systems for some 2,000 villages; (f) the electrification of about 300,000 rural households through a program involving some 2,700 sub-projects; and (g) the improvement of hydrological services.
